html.title: FINEST-Law â€“ Finnish and Estonian legislations on the Semantic Web
html.description: FINEST-Law is a semantic portal which provides ready-to-use tooling for exploring and analyzing legal documents

appTitle.subheading: Finnish and Estonian Legislation on the Semantic Web (UNDER DEVELOPMENT)

selectPerspective: Select statutes perspective to search and browse the legislation data:
mainPageUnderConstruction: Note! This application is under development.
backendErrorText: One of the backend services is not available at the moment. Please try again later.

facetBar.sortByNumberOfSearchResults: Sort by number of search results

exportToYasgui: open the result table query in yasgui sparql editor
resultsAsCSV: download the search results as a CSV table

dateFacet.toBeforeFrom: The start date must be before the end date.

sliderFacet.invalidStartOrEnd: Min value must be smaller than max value. The smallest value can be {min} and the largest value can be {max}.

statutes.label: Statutes
statutes.longDescription:
Use this perspective to access data related to the statutes of the Finnish and Estonian consolidated legislation. The facets provide selections to filter the result set, which is shown on the table view. The result view can be selected using the tabs:

  • TABLE view shows all statutes in the result set. One table row corresponds to one statute.
  • EXPORT tab contains a link to open the SPARQL query used to generate the result table view into YASGUI query editor. This is intended for software developers.

instancePage.label: Statutes
instancePage.description:
This page shows the content and metadata of legislation. The information of the regulations is based on the material of Semantinen Finlex and Riigi Teataja. The view contains three tabs:

  • CONTENT tab displays the textual content of the legislation.
  • DETAILS tab displays the statute's metadata and a link to the original source of the legislation.
  • OPEN IN YASGUI tab contains a link to open a query that Returns the statute's information in the YASGUI application. This tab is for for application developers.

euDirectives.label: EU directives
euDirectives.shortDescription: Faceted search for consolidated EU directives (UNFINISHED PLACEHOLDER)
